EmailTemplate.name: ANG Anual Renewal Case EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – Annual revalidation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
In accordance with the provisions of the IATA Passenger Sales Agency Rules, we hereby request your confirmation of the following information related to your Agency:
a) Agent’s Legal Name
b) VAT
c) Company type
d) Billing address
e) Telephone and fax
f) License number
g) Ownership and % of shares
h) Management details
i) Details of the Agent’s IATA contact person(s)
j) Agent website address
k) GDS
Please click here in order to submit your details. Failure to do so by the deadline given, would result in an administrative noncompliance being taken against your Agency.
We trust you give to this matter your immediate attention.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any queries on this matter via our Customer Service Portal at http://www.iata.org/cs
Yours faithfully,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
